title: Creating Presets In The Cloud App
description: Learn how to create, modify and delete presets and preset folders in the cloud app. Create your own presets from scrap or modify one from the global preset folders. It's simple and easy.

title: New Peek Function Firmware Update
description: We have a new feature on the app cloud app. Follow this video to do a firmware update to your ShowHome controller to enable the new peek function to work. If you don't see the firmware update button in the drop down check and see that your app is up to date by checking the apple store or the google play store.

title: Govee VS ShowHome's Track System
description:
A tracked version of the ever popular GoVee lights. These lights have the same visual effect as the Govee lights but with the option to clip the lights into a aluminum track for a more professional look.                            Some of the differences include.
Govee                                                 ShowHome
16" spacing                                       8" spacing
3M adhesive back                           3M adhesive back or clips into a aluminum track
Comes in 16ft strings                     Comes in 3.3ft strings for easy replacement 
Only a RGB light                               RGBW light, separate 3000k white LED for architectural lighting
System maxes out at 150ft            Can do 1000ft + with one controller 

00:00 Intro 
01:09 16" spacing Vs 8" spacing 
01:55 RGB Vs RGBW 
03:10 How they Fit into a Track 
04:05 2 piece track system 
05:25 Power Injection 
08:10 Works with WLED 
09:05 Installing our lights on a house 
12:40 Installing Govee lights 
15:34 Comparing the 2 at night

To separate these lights from our other track lights we will call these "Showvee lights" in the descriptions on the website 

Check the lights out at https://showhomelighting.com/products/smd5054rgbw-1-44w-dc24v-ucs2904-ip68-5pcs-strip
Find the white track at  https://showhomelighting.com/products/track-for-glmd193-rgbw-lights-in-white-35-20-1000
Find the Black Track at https://showhomelighting.com/products/track-for-glmd193-rgbw-lights-in-black-35-20-1000

title: 1000ft DIY Install From A Simple Layout
description: Customer sent me some pictures and video of their home they completed, so I made a little video out of them. Total house and barn was 1000ft of track and lights, one controller for the barn and one for the house, both synced together. Lots of power injection. Turned out great!

title: Using offsets to make patterns
